short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically adds the '?debug=1' parameter to the URL of ERP Odoo

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension allows you to permanently activate the debug mode on any Odoo ERP. If you need, it is possible to disable this function.
